name: WarMages
summary:
The game tells about the adventures of the magician and his team.

Tournament of the Mages. A legendary event that can not be predicted, only nature is able to decide when it will begin. Tournament, which will clash in a fierce battle, thousands of magicians, each of whom is ready to sacrifice their lives for the sake of victory. But our Hero is not like that, he is an ordinary guy from the village who always dreamed of getting into the tournament of magicians, and nature fulfilled her desire, organizing the tournament when he was 16 years old. This story is about how an ordinary guy, without special skills talents, became a Hero.
